Question
========

A couple wants to have two children, which outcome space below is correct? We define the events J as a boy and M as a girl.

Answerlist
----------

* S = {YY, MJ, JM}
* S = {YY, MM, YY, MJ, MJ}
* S = {MM, JJ, MJ, JM}
* S = {JJ, MM, MJ, MJ, JM}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* S = {YY, MJ, JM}: Incorrect
* S = {YY, MM, YY, MJ}: Incorrect
* S = {MM, YY, MJ, JM}: Correct
* S = {JJJ, MM, MJ, MJ, JM}: Incorrect
